title: Fantasy RPG and Adventure Music
description: Improve your games, projects, videos with melodic, atmospheric and mysterious soundtracks.
longDescription:
This background music collection perfect for Action, RPG, MMORPG, Strategy and Adventure games and projects, videos. Contains different moods and styles from calm melodic fantasy music to cinematic, energetic combat soundtracks.

This package contains looped atmospheric background sounds. The different atmospheric background sounds are included separately in the package. 

Preview: https://youtu.be/3fMofPRqyrk


You can make your world unique with this soundtracks.


Full strings, cellos, chorus, big drums, rhythmic instrumentation for combat scenes.

Deep pads, slow and pulsating basses, soft noises for dark moods.

Melodic fantasy tracks with strings and and various wind instruments. Mixed with modern synthesizer sounds. Voices from the depths of the forest for the exploration scenes.


Please read the description for details: Documentation
